title: Option Traders Making Large Bullish Bets On Facebook Following Recent Weakness
text: Facebook, Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) shares have bounced a bit this week, but remain down 7.5% overall in the past month.

title: Market is focused on individual stocks, not broader tech sector: Portfolio manager
text: Brook Dane of Goldman Sachs Asset Management, joins CNBC's "Fast Money Halftime Report" team to discuss how the market is trading tech stocks and what he's watching.

title: Instagram may allow creators to syndicate IGTV videos to Facebook
text: Following the departure of Instagram’s founders, Facebook is working to more closely integrate the photo-sharing app with its flagship social network. It’s already added its brand name next to Instagram’s, and is working to make both platforms’ messaging products interoperable.

title: Facebook rolls out new business tools for Messenger, kills the ‘Discover’ tab
text: Facebook today is formally rolling out a new suite of tools for its 40 million active businesses on Messenger, including appointment booking, lead generation, and others announced earlier this year at its F8 developer conference. As a part of these changes, Facebook will also begin to phase out the Discover tab in Messenger — a […]

title: Big News For Facebook Investors And No One Noticed

title: Facebook tightens political ad rules ahead of US election
text: Facebook is tightening its rules on US political adverts to combat potentially misleading campaigns ahead of the 2020 presidential election.
